movie.title: School of Rock
movie.actors: Jack Black, Adam Pascal, Lucas Papaelias, Chris Stack
movie.plot: Down and out rock star Dewey Finn gets fired from his band, and he faces a mountain of debts and depression. He takes a job as a 4th grade substitute teacher at an uptight private school where his attitude and hijinx have a powerful effect on his students. He also meets Zack, a 10-year-old guitar prodigy, who could help Dewey win a "battle of the bands" competition, which would solve his financial problems and put him back in the spotlight.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 8 wins & 13 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Black's exuberant, gleeful performance turns School of Rock into a hilarious, rocking good time.
